alert.note: Alert for Gregg (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 2:22PM CST until January 27 at 2:40PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Rabbit Creek At Kilgore affecting Gregg County. For the Rabbit Creek...including Kilgore...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rabbit Creek at Kilgore. * WHEN...Until early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Expect about one hundred acres to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:45 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 13.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 10.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:45 PM CST Wednesday was 13.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall to 10.3 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then rise to 10.5 feet tomorrow evening. It will fall below flood stage early Friday morning to 5.0 feet Saturday morning. It will then rise to 5.4 feet early Sunday morning. It will fall again and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.3 feet on 02/03/1975. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Thursday afternoon at 230 PM CST.
